name: Outlook 15 Message Header
summary: Learn about .OLK15MESSAGE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Microsoft Outlook is an email and calendar app available for Windows and macOS. Microsoft Outlook 15, a Mac version of Outlook released in 2014, saves local copies of users' email messages in a series of OLK15 files.

For example, an email that includes body content and an attachment would have its data saved in three separate files, an OLK15MESSAGE file, an .OLK15MSGSOURCE file, and an .OLK15MSGATTACH file. Outlook 15 uses these files to load messages more quickly when a user is browsing their email.
The OLK15MESSAGE file contains the email's header content, including the email's To, From, and Subject information. Outlook 15 saves OLK15MESSAGE files in the following directory:

description: An OLK15MESSAGE file is an email data file created by Microsoft Outlook 15 (Outlook 2016) for Mac. It contains an email's header information; it does not contain the email's body content. Outlook for Mac uses OLK15MESSAGE files to show message overviews.

instructions: OLK15MESSAGE files are temporary files and not meant to be opened by users. However, you can use Gladwev OLK14 Message Recovery Tool (Mac) to recover the message data your OLK15MESSAGE files (and other OLK15 files) contain.
